  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_111019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">H-K diagram for three star clusters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">H-K Diagramm für drei Sternblöcke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le diagramme de H-K pour trois tiennent le premier rôle des
batteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama de H-K para três conjuntos da estrela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema di H-K per tre serie di ingranaggi della 
stella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα του HK για τρεις τομείς αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de H-K para tres racimos de la estrella</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These Hertzsprung-Russell diagrams (H-K diagrams) illustrate the relationship of absolute magnitude of brightness and temperature for three star clusters Cluster X, Cluster Y, and Cluster Z.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absolute magnitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brightness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clusters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hertzsprung-Russell diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Hertzsprung-Russell Diagramme (H-K 
Diagramme) veranschaulichen das Verhältnis der absoluten Größe der 
Helligkeit und der Temperatur für drei Sternblöcke Block X, Block Y 
und Block Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes de Hertzsprung-Russell (diagrammes 
de H-K) illustrent le rapport de l'importance absolue de l'éclat et 
de la température pour trois tiennent le premier rôle la batterie X de 
batteries, la batterie Y, et la batterie Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de Hertzsprung-Russell (diagramas
de H-K) ilustram o relacionamento do valor absoluto do brilho e da 
temperatura para o conjunto X de três conjuntos da estrela, o 
conjunto Y, e o conjunto Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi di Hertzsprung-Russell (schemi di 
H-K) illustrano il rapporto di grandezza assoluta di luminosità e 
della temperatura per una serie di ingranaggi X delle tre serie di 
ingranaggi della stella, la serie di ingranaggi Y e la serie di 
ingranaggi Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα χερτζσπρuνγ-Russell (διαγράμματα
του HK) επεξηγούν τη σχέση του απόλυτου μεγέθους της 
φωτεινότητας και η θερμοκρασία για το αστέρι τρία συγκεντρώνεται 
τον τομέα Χ, τον τομέα Υ, και τον τομέα ζ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas de Hertzsprung-Russell (diagramas 
de H-K) ilustran el lazo de la magnitud absoluta del brillo y de la 
temperatura para el racimo X de tres racimos de la estrella, el racimo
Y, y el racimo Z.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">absolute Größe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helligkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blöcke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hertzsprung-Russell Diagramme</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">batteries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagrammes de Hertzsprung-Russell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tient le premier rôle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
